methods.name: canEnchant
javadoc: Determines if this enchantment can be applied to a specific ItemStack.

methods.name: getMaxLevel
javadoc: Returns the maximum level that the enchantment can have.

methods.name: getMinCost
javadoc: Returns the minimal value of enchantability needed on the enchantment level passed.

methods.name: shouldIgnoreDurabilityDrop
javadoc: Used by ItemStack.attemptDamageItem. Randomly determines if a point of damage should be negated using the enchantment level (par1). If the ItemStack is Armor then there is a flat 60% chance for damage to be negated no matter the enchantment level, otherwise there is a 1-(par/1) chance for damage to be negated.
